properties.creator: Sanborn-Perris Map Co
properties.title: Buena Vista
properties.description: 1 map on 3 sheets : col. ; sheets 64 x 54 cm
properties.note: Shows building construction by hand coloring, locations of windows and doors, and available water facilities.Shows factories, commercial and religious occupancy of buildings, dwellings with property boundaries and house and block numbers.Jan 1896.Includes notes on population, water facilities, fire department, and prevailing winds.Microfilm edition known as: Sanborn fire insurance maps. Colorado.
properties.funder: This project was funded in part through a Library Services and Technology Act (LSTA) grant administered by the Colorado State Library and in part by the Friends of the Libraries
properties.holdingInst: Map Library, University Libraries, University of Colorado at Boulder
properties.collection: Discovering Colorado Story by Story: The Sanborn Fire Insurance Maps Collection
